mapper.select: SELECT XSP. NAME AS name, XSP.VALUE AS value FROM ( SELECT XSM.BASIC_ID AS basicId, SUM(XSO.NUM) AS num FROM XH_STOCK_OUT XSO INNER JOIN XH_STOCK_MAIN XSM ON XSM.ID = XSO.ID GROUP BY XSO.ID ) AS A INNER JOIN XH_GOODS_SPEC XGS ON XGS.GOODS_ID = A.basicId LEFT JOIN XH_SPEC_P XSP ON XSP.VALUE = XGS.GOODS_SPEC_VALUE INNER JOIN XH_SPEC_H XSH ON XSH.ID = XSP.ID AND XSH.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL AND XSH.BRAND_ID != '' ORDER BY A.num DESC
